languages.text: "Дай угадаю детали похищения лорда Моллеса: пираты появились как из ниоткуда, точно знали, когда напасть, а у его жены к тому моменту были на руках все документы, чтобы выправить справку о смерти".

"Allow me to guess the details of Lord Molles's kidnapping: the pirates appeared out of nowhere, knew exactly when to attack, at which point his wife had already prepared all the documents she needed to request the issuance of his death certificate."
languages.original_text: "Дай угадаю детали похищения лорда Моллеса: пираты появились как из ниоткуда, точно знали, когда напасть, а у его жены к тому моменту были на руках все документы, чтобы выправить справку о смерти".

"Allow me to guess the details of Lord Molles's kidnapping: the pirates appeared out of nowhere, knew exactly when to attack, at which point his wife had already prepared all the documents she needed to request the issuance of his death certificate."

languages.text: "Gestattet mir, die Einzelheiten von Lord Molles' Entführung zu vermuten: Die Piraten erschienen aus dem Nichts und wussten genau, wann sie angreifen mussten – und zu diesem Zeitpunkt hatte seine Frau bereits alle Dokumente vorbereitet, die sie für den Antrag auf Ausstellung eines Totenscheins brauchte."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to guess the details of Lord Molles's kidnapping: the pirates appeared out of nowhere, knew exactly when to attack, at which point his wife had already prepared all the documents she needed to request the issuance of his death certificate."

traits.locale_text: "Gestattet mir, die Einzelheiten von Lord Molles' Entführung zu vermuten: Die Piraten erschienen aus dem Nichts und wussten genau, wann sie angreifen mussten – und zu diesem Zeitpunkt hatte seine Frau bereits alle Dokumente vorbereitet, die sie für den Antrag auf Ausstellung eines Totenscheins brauchte."

languages.text: « Permettez-moi de deviner le détail de l'enlèvement du seigneur Molles. Les pirates sont apparus tout à coup et savaient exactement quand attaquer. Son épouse avait bien entendu déjà préparé tous les papiers nécessaires pour récupérer son certificat de décès. »
languages.original_text: "Allow me to guess the details of Lord Molles's kidnapping: the pirates appeared out of nowhere, knew exactly when to attack, at which point his wife had already prepared all the documents she needed to request the issuance of his death certificate."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi de deviner le détail de l'enlèvement du seigneur Molles. Les pirates sont apparus tout à coup et savaient exactement quand attaquer. Son épouse avait bien entendu déjà préparé tous les papiers nécessaires pour récupérer son certificat de décès. »

languages.text: “不如让我猜测一下莫莱斯勋爵遭到绑架的细节吧。那群海盗突然间冒了出来，非常清楚什么时候该发动攻击。而在海盗袭击的时候，莫莱斯勋爵的妻子早已准备好了签发死亡证明需要的所有文件。”
languages.original_text: "Allow me to guess the details of Lord Molles's kidnapping: the pirates appeared out of nowhere, knew exactly when to attack, at which point his wife had already prepared all the documents she needed to request the issuance of his death certificate."

traits.locale_text: “不如让我猜测一下莫莱斯勋爵遭到绑架的细节吧。那群海盗突然间冒了出来，非常清楚什么时候该发动攻击。而在海盗袭击的时候，莫莱斯勋爵的妻子早已准备好了签发死亡证明需要的所有文件。”

languages.text: «Permítame adivinar los detalles del secuestro de lord Molles: los piratas aparecieron de improviso, sabían exactamente dónde y cuándo atacar, y su esposa ya había preparado la documentación necesaria para el certificado de defunción».
languages.original_text: "Allow me to guess the details of Lord Molles's kidnapping: the pirates appeared out of nowhere, knew exactly when to attack, at which point his wife had already prepared all the documents she needed to request the issuance of his death certificate."

traits.locale_text: «Permítame adivinar los detalles del secuestro de lord Molles: los piratas aparecieron de improviso, sabían exactamente dónde y cuándo atacar, y su esposa ya había preparado la documentación necesaria para el certificado de defunción».

languages.text: 「モレス公の誘拐の詳細を推測させてくれ。海賊たちはどこからともなく現れた。彼らは襲撃のタイミングを正確に把握していた。その時点で彼の妻はすでに、彼の死亡証明書を申請するために必要な書類をすべて準備していた…といったところだろう」
languages.original_text: "Allow me to guess the details of Lord Molles's kidnapping: the pirates appeared out of nowhere, knew exactly when to attack, at which point his wife had already prepared all the documents she needed to request the issuance of his death certificate."

traits.locale_text: 「モレス公の誘拐の詳細を推測させてくれ。海賊たちはどこからともなく現れた。彼らは襲撃のタイミングを正確に把握していた。その時点で彼の妻はすでに、彼の死亡証明書を申請するために必要な書類をすべて準備していた…といったところだろう」

languages.text: "Lord Molles'in kaçırılma olayının ayrıntılarını tahmin etmeme izin verin: Korsanlar bir anda ortaya çıktı, saldırıyı kusursuz bir zamanlamayla planladılar. Hâlbuki eşi, kocasının ölüm belgesini talep etmek için gerekli tüm evrakları çoktan hazırlamıştı bile."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to guess the details of Lord Molles's kidnapping: the pirates appeared out of nowhere, knew exactly when to attack, at which point his wife had already prepared all the documents she needed to request the issuance of his death certificate."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Molles'ın kaçırılma olayının ayrıntılarını tahmin etmeme izin verin: Korsanlar bir anda ortaya çıktı, saldırıyı kusursuz bir zamanlamayla planladılar. Hâlbuki eşi, kocasının ölüm belgesini talep etmek için gerekli tüm evrakları çoktan hazırlamıştı bile."
